@thegayestmfer no one has a problem with it? did you skip kindergarten and don't know how to read? there's plenty of comments complaining from people that even find porn of their favorite cartoons that they grow up watching as a kid . Why you may ask? because we're not able to separate the good moments that these shows gave us as kids from the kinks and fetishes many of us have now, we associate this shows with the innocence of being a kid, with not knowing the true nature of this world. Because someone doesn't like gay porn or isn't really comfortable watching it doesn't make them homophobic
